content.question: Which of the following describes the relationship between model <math alttext="Q"><mi>Q</mi></math> and model <math alttext="P"> <mi>P</mi> </math> ?

choices.label: In model <math alttext="Q"><mi>Q</mi></math> the new growth factor is reduced by <math alttext="0.9"><mn>0.9</mn></math> times the growth factor in model <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math>.
In model <math alttext="Q"><mi>Q</mi></math> the new initial value is reduced by <math alttext="0.9"><mn>0.9</mn></math> times the initial value in model <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math>.
In model <math alttext="Q"><mi>Q</mi></math> the new growth factor is <math alttext="0.9"><mn>0.9</mn></math> times as large as the growth factor in model <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math>.
In model <math alttext="Q"><mi>Q</mi></math> the new initial value is <math alttext="0.9"><mn>0.9</mn></math> times as large as the initial value in model <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math>.

content.answer: In model <math alttext="Q"><mi>Q</mi></math> the new growth factor is <math alttext="0.9"><mn>0.9</mn></math> times as large as the growth factor in model <math alttext="P"><mi>P</mi></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
